Author: Sea_Plane
Text: My parents would always say this as a 'joke' towards me. When the car scraped out of an angled driveway etc they'd be like 'shouldn't have had so much dinner sea_plane! Haha!' When they're both morbidly obese and I was like, a slightly chubby 10 years old. I think that was the joke, like they meant it in a self deprecating way but my 12 year old brain was like 'oh my god really??? I'm weighing the car down? I'm BREAKING THE CAR WITH MY ENORMOUS WEIGHT???" And then I'd feel guilty as hell about ruining the car. Smh
